title: Roast shoulder of lamb with roast potatoes and spring greens
description: Try James Martin's simple recipe for a lamb roast dinner with all the trimmings.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
10 King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into 2 or 3 pieces
50g/2oz beef dripping, lard or vegetable oil
large bunch fresh mint, leaves picked, finely chopped
